name: Fruit Catcher - 2D Game Made Using OpenGL
name_original: Fruit Catcher - 2D Game Made Using OpenGL
description:
The game "Fruit Catcher" is an educational game for children. The game is an arcade genre where the player will capture the falling fruit in order to get the point, if the player captures then the life of the player will decrease. The game is over when the song ends.

Find us on Github: https://github.com/StevenWillyS/FruitCatcher

Find us on Youtube: www.youtube.com/watch?v=d37PoyuaOus&feature=youtu.be
